summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6129 for the improvement of Caroline Avenue from North 88th Street to approximately 300 feet south thereof; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85184 as amended by Ordinance No. 85318, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
